dc:title: Ammon Hennacy: 'Non-Church' Christian
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recalls Ammon Hennacy'slife and contribution to the Catholic Worker Movement. Admires his courage, hard work, dedication, voluntary poverty, and constant struggle against war. Admits he was sometimes harsh and anticlerical but acknowledges "He was an inspiration and reproach." --a unique kind of Christian.
